name: All
line: (singing) Love. Connection. Experience.

name: Rick
line: Yeah Morty

name: All
line: (singing) Come together. With love. connection, experience! [laughter]

name: Rick
line: It's my favourite song

name: Morty
line: Hahahahaha, yeah

name: Rick
line: Oh yeah, distress beacon! [belches] Yeah baby!

name: Morty
line: You're excited about that?

name: Rick
line: The first rule of space travel kids, is always check out distress beacons; nine out of ten times its a ship full of dead aliens and a bunch of free shit!

name: Morty and Summer
line: Whoa!

name: Rick
line: One out of ten times its a deadly trap, but I'm ready to roll those dice!

name: Summer
line: Seems like something terrible happened here.

name: Rick
line: Yeah. Cha-ching. Oh yeah, if you find a room full of eggs, don't shy away from it, give one of them a shake. Those facehuggers are worth more than this ship.

name: Morty
line: Uh, what's that?

name: Rick
line: This will make the cops write it up as a looting by the Korblocks.

name: Summer
line: That's horrible!

name: Rick
line: I hear you man, cops are racist.

name: Rick
line: Oh, hey! You're alive! Thank God.

name: Female alien
line: Can you help us? Our planet was taken over by some kind of [pauses] entity! It absorbed the minds of our people!

name: Male alien 1
line: We didn't notice until it was too late. The people it takes over, they look like your friends, your family, your leaders, but they're not, themselves any more; They're part of It.

name: Rick
line: And how do you know it didn't get on the ship with you? Those two ding-dongs seem pretty calm about the whole thing.

name: Male alien with glasses
line: Hey! No, no- uurgh!

name: Rick
line: Called it.

name: All six aliens together
line: Hello Rick. Long time no see.

name: Rick
line: Unity!?

name: Morty
line: Rick?

name: Summer
line: Grandpa?

name: Rick
line: Oh boy. Uh, these are my grandkids, Summer and Morty. Summer, Morty, this is uh, Unity. We sort of used to, uh, date.

name: Rick
line: Quite an operation you got going here Une. You're a whole planet now huh?

name: Unity (Administrator)
line: After we broke up, I spend some time wandering through space,

name: Unity (Thin suited man)
line: then I found this world,

name: Unity (Large suited man)
line: where I was better able to focus on my passion for unification.

name: Summer
line: You mean stealing peoples’ bodies?

name: Rick
line: Summer, rude. Why don't you kids run off and play with Unity while Unity and I do some catching up.

name: Summer
line: Ugh.

name: Morty
line: Wait! Rick, aren't these people going to barf into our mouths and absorb us?

name: Unity (Administrator)
line: You're guests here on my planet, you're free to be yourselves; I've never been good at disappointing Rick.

name: Summer
line: Well now I'm going to barf. Come on Morty.

name: Beth
line: Jerry, what are you- what are you doing in here?

name: Jerry
line: I'm trying to find our weed whacker, ‘cause our weeds are wack, yo.

name: Beth
line: But you can't go in the garage when Rick's not here.

name: Jerry
line: I can't?

name: Beth
line: Well, he doesn't like it.

name: Jerry
line: What's he gonna do, crash rent-free at his other family's house?

name: Beth
line: What is that supposed to mean?

name: Jerry
line: Your dad gets to walk all over us because of your abandonment issues! He's playing you, shorty.

name: Beth
line: Oh, stop affecting that stupid hip-hop dialect!

name: Jerry
line: Stop shifting the crosshairs to my ironic urban patois just because your relationship with your father is toe-up from the flow-up.

name: Jerry
line: What the hell was that?

name: Beth
line: (whispering) I don't know, let's just leave!

name: Jerry
line: That is a hatch! Your father put a hatch in my garage!

name: Beth
line: You don't know it was him! [pauses] Anyway, we’re not supposed to be in here!

name: Jerry
line: Obviously, neither is whatever's gurgling down there.

name: Rick
line: World peace achieved. Nice! A little weird to publish a paper about it for yourself, but hey. So what's next?

name: Unity (Newsagent)
line: After I become a type-one civilisation, this world will be invited into the Galactic Federation.

name: Rick
line: Oh, goody.

name: Unity (Customer)
line: From there I'll have access to countless planets and species.

name: Unity (Pedestrian)
line: One by one, I will unify them, I will become the universe, and I will be what the single-minded once called a god.

name: Rick
line: [burps] I like that. Oh, that's pretty sexy. Hey listen, where can I get a drink around here?

name: Unity (Old woman)
line: Recreational substances were phased out here. There's no need for escape from the self when your world is one.

name: Rick
line: Unity, Unity, who am I talking to? I watched you assimilate a whole police station just to get your hands on the evidence locker.

name: Unity (Worker)
line: Rick, when we met I was a young hivemind with the population of a small town. People... change.

name: Unity (Busker)
line: Especially when I change them. I'm sorry to disappoint you, but... I’ve grown.

name: Rick
line: Hey, listen, I’ve grown too. I have! See, I’ve- I’ve reconnected with my family, right?

name: Unity (Police officer)
line: Hm, why is that I wonder?

name: Rick
line: Maybe it's part of getting old. Maybe I just miss being with... a collective.

name: Unity (Crowd)
line: Yes Rick! Yes! Yes!

name: Rick
line: Oh yeah!

name: Unity (Crowd)
line: Yes! Yes!

name: Rick
line: Wait, wait, stop! H-Hold it! Not like this. We need a hang glider. And a crotchless Uncle Sam costume. And I want the entire field of your largest stadium covered end to end with naked redheads! And I want the stands packed with every man that remotely resembles my father!

name: Morty
line: Look at ‘em go! So coordinated! What’s your problem? They’re making you into a Mount Rushmore! They made burgers!

name: Summer
line: Morty, open your eyes! There is no they! These poor people's’ bodies are being used! They're a planet of puppets!

name: Unity (Fan holder)
line: I can hear you.

name: Summer
line: Ugh!

name: Morty
line: Well, seems like everybody here's cool with it. Except for all those redheads. They seem like they're in a hurry to be somewhere else.

name: Unity (Clown)
line: Balloon, Summer? Balloon, Morty?

name: Summer
line: No, we don't want your dumb balloons. We’re bored. Take us back to Rick.

name: Unity (Clown)
line: Now's... not a good time.

name: Rick
line: Oh yeah! I want youuuuuu!

name: Unity (Stadium)
line: Go son go! Go son go! Go son go!

name: Jerry
line: Oh! Real nice! Real nice! How does a man do this without me noticing?

name: Beth
line: Oh, you know my dad. Once he puts his mind to something...

name: Jerry
line: You're spinning this to his credit?

name: Jerry
line: I'm going down there.

name: Beth
line: Jerry!

name: Jerry
line: Beth, this is my house, which makes this my garage, my secret hatch, my hidden subterranean lair,  and my faceless gargler. Now, are you going to keep hating this playa, or are you gonna jack my steed?

name: Beth
line: Okay, you're just making stuff up now.

name: Rick
line: Oh my god. Oh my god. [Drinks water]

name: Unity (Redheads)
line: Oh Rick, it was so bad.

name: Rick
line: What's this ‘was’ stuff? I just need to hydrate and then we’re doing that again!

name: Unity (Redhead)
line: Oh damn.

name: Rick
line: Listen, if this is an invasion I gotta sit this one out, but I'll- I'll be back to have sex with the survivors.

name: Unity (Redhead)
line: It's a neighboring hivemind species, Beta-7. Our planet's maintained a practical alliance for exchange of vital resources. (whispering) So be nice!

name: Beta-7
line: Unity. [pauses] Is it a... bad time? Are all... present lifeforms... assimilated?

name: Unity (Man with glasses)
line: Beta-7, this is my single-minded friend from Earth, Rick.

name: Beta-7
line: Rick... Sanchez. Unity has spoken of you.

name: Rick
line: All bad I hope. [laughing]

name: Rick
line: Whoa, Jesus Christ!

name: Unity (Redhead)
line: Beta-7, if my allies are a problem for you perhaps our alliance is as well.

name: Beta-7
line: Our alliance is beneficial. When Beta-7 expresses concern it- it's only ... be-because...

name: Rick
line: Oh snap! Powdered neutronium? Amphetetron? You know what I can make with this stuff?

name: Unity (Redhead)
line: Oh... Rick, I- I shouldn't...

name: Rick
line: Come on, it's not every day that I'm in town! It- it's for old time's sake.

name: Unity (Redhead)
line: Uh... Okay, what the hell! We can purify the resin and make fractal dust!

name: Rick
line: Oh, I was thinking velocitinis, but...

name: Unity
line: Aww, old man Rick can't party with the whole planet?

name: Rick
line: I can do whatever you do and more, baby.

name: Beta-7
line: Hrmm...

name: Rick
line: You know, I think Beta-7 over there is hoping your alliance can be more than practical.

name: Jerry
line: Well, this explains the six thousand dollar electric bill.

name: Blim Blam
line: [Gurgling]

name: Jerry
line: Well. Nice. Real nice. Alien prisoners under the house. Real nice. Nice. Reeeal-

name: Beth
line: Goddamn it, stop.

name: Summer
line: Wake up people! You have to fight it! You're under the spell of an evil monster!

name: Unity (Man with glasses)
line: I can hear you.

name: Summer
line: Yeah! So you keep saying!

name: Morty
line: Summer!

name: Summer
line: Wake up! You have to have some individuality left in there!

name: Unity (Steven Phillips)
line: Why do you hate me, Summer?

name: Summer
line: I'm not talking to you! I'm talking to...

name: Summer
line: ...Steven Phillips! Steven! Set yourself free!

name: Unity (Steven Phillips)
line: Summer, before I took over this planet, this man was a registered sex offender.

name: Summer
line: ...Yeah, well so what? At least he was himself.

name: Unity (M.Biologist)
line: This woman was a drug addict on the verge of suicide. Now she's a marine biologist.

name: Morty
line: Listen Unity, I don't think my sister's trying to say that life would be perfect without you. I think she's just saying that life would be... you know, life.

name: Unity (Old man)
line: I have transformed life here into a paradise. Prostitutes are now scientists. The homeless are now phisosophers.

name: Summer
line: Oh, phi- phisosophers?

name: Unity (Old man)
line: Philophiluh... phiphophibup...

name: Summer
line: Oh my god. Where did you learn to talk you grandpa-stealing slut?

name: Unity (Old man)
line: I'm feeling... urk!

name: Morty
line: Oh man! Let me help all of you guys up!

name: Unity (All)
line: I'm fine!

name: Unity (Administrator)
line: Do you know what I love about you, Rick? You're the only single mind I’ve met who really sees the big picture.

name: Rick
line: You got that right. But... baby, listen. Y-you're talking about taking over planets and galaxies, you gotta... you gotta just... remember to let go sometimes, you know.

name: Unity (Administrator)
line: I can let go! Hey, look! You see that town across the river? Watch this.

name: Rick
line: Whoa!

name: Unity (Administrator)
line: Ha ha! Woot!

name: Rick
line: Whoa! That's not what I meant!

name: Unity (Administrator)
line: [laughing] It's okay! It's okay, I evacuated! I evacuated the town, look!

name: Unity (Townspeople)
line: Hey! Right here! We’re fine!

name: Rick
line: [laughing] Oh, that was awesome! My grandkids weren't in that town, right? A-are my grandkids alive? ... H-hey, my drink is empty.

name: Morty and Summer
line: Aah!

name: Summer
line: Unity, what's happening?

name: Steven Phillips
line: Who's Unity? You kids have nice feet. Mind if I take a picture?

name: Summer
line: Gross, no!

name: Morty
line: I think you're getting what you wanted, Summer. Something's happening to Unity.

name: Summer
line: Do... all of you remember who you are?

name: Ron Benson
line: ...Yeah. My name is Ron Benson. I'm... an electrical engineer. Father of two, and as you can see from my flat concentric nipple rings, I'm a member of this planet's top race! [opens shirt to reveal ring nipples]

name: Summer
line: Okay, that's good! Uh... Don't focus too much on the last part, but...

name: Daryl Jefferson
line: I'm Daryll Jefferson. I'm a landscaper. And I'll be damned if that ripple-nipple bitch's race is superior! [removes shirt] The cone-nipple people will rule this world!

name: Ron Benson
line: You shut your mouth, you dirty knife-nipple bastards!

name: Daryl Jefferson
line: What'd you say to me, you target-chested piece of shit?

name: Alien man
line: Race war!

name: Summer
line: Why are you fighting? Can't you see you're all the same?

name: Morty
line: Ah, Summer. Ha ha. First race war, huh?

name: Morty
line: Way to go, Summer. You started a race war.

name: Summer
line: I didn't start it! They're the racists! I... I  merely empowered them to follow their apparently misguided dreams!

name: Morty
line: Okay, thanks for clarifying! Y- I'll have a super accurate headstone now!

name: Rioter
line: Hey wait, what race are you guys?

name: Morty
line: [pulling up shirt] We’re neither! S-see?

name: Summer
line: Yeah, take my word for it. We just have regular nipples.

name: Rioter
line: Hey! These two freaks have no race!

name: Morty
line: Oh, there's no place like home! There's no place like home! Remember, Summer?

name: Summer
line: Oh...

name: Morty
line: From Dorothy and The Tiny People movie?

name: Summer
line: O-oh, yes, yes yes...

name: Morty
line: All the tiny people?

name: Summer
line: Dorothy, take us away! Take us away!

name: Unity (SWAT)
line: Hello Summer. Hello Morty.

name: Unity (Pilot)
line: It's okay! You're safe now.

name: Morty
line: U-Unity?

name: Unity (SWAT)
line: Yes.

name: Summer
line: Oh, Unity I am so sorry. I didn't know freedom meant people doing stuff that sucks! I was thinking more of... a choose-your-own-cellphone-carrier thing.

name: Unity (Pilot)
line: Oh, Summer, you did nothing wrong! I'm having fun with your grandpa! Lost a little control. Probably shouldn't be piloting a hovercopter, nor should I be... running two hundred thousand pediatric hospitals and twelve million deep friers, but hey! It's not like this planet can take its business elsewhere!

name: Morty
line: Um... should we maybe stop somewhere and get you a coffee? Maybe splash a little water on your face, or...?

name: Unity (Pilot)
line: No, no, if I wanted to be sober, I wouldn't have gotten drunk! Wooohoooo!

name: Jerry
line: Oh man. I cannot wait. I cannot wait to hear Rick explain his way around this. He is gone!

name: Beth
line: Jerry, stop! Please, okay, we weren't even supposed to be down here. If we confront him about this-

name: Jerry
line: Oh my god! I love this! I love that this is how far you will go for him. You wanna go upstairs, and cut carrots, and watch a Lifetime original, above a fucking alien dungeon! Your relationship with your father is psychotic!

name: Beth
line: Oh listen to you relish the idea that my genius father is a bad person! Step out of your ego for a second and look at this thing! It's a monster! He might have it chained up so that it doesn't eat the planet!

name: Jerry
line: Right, because your father's such an altruist? I once saw him briefly forget the word for humans! He's probably harvesting this creature's organs!

name: Beth
line: He's probably racing to cure its space aids!

name: Jerry
line: He's going to eat it!

name: Beth
line: He's protecting it!

name: Blim Blam
line: [Gurgles]

name: Both
line: Shut up!

name: Summer
line: Unity! This place is a mess!

name: Unity (Administrator)
line: Oh, it's cool! The part of me that's the cleaning lady is coming on Friday. [gasps] Oh my god! I have a meeting at the galactic federation in an hour. Oh, I'll never make it! Ah, I'll push it to next week.

name: Morty
line: Unity, could you get Rick out here please?

name: Unity (Administrator)
line: He's... unavailable! He's-

name: Summer
line: Having sex with you, we get it! Gross. Get him out here now.

name: Unity (Administrator)
line: I don't think he wants to be-

name: Summer
line: (shouting) Grandpa Rick!

name: Morty
line: (shouting) Rick! Rick!

name: Summer
line: (shouting) I'm gonna tell mom and dad about the gagoo you have locked up under the garage!

name: Rick
line: What the hell... is your problem?

name: Summer
line: Grandpa, we need to go home! Now!

name: Rick
line: Fine, geez!

name: Rick
line: See ya!

name: Morty
line: Uh, Rick? I think we should all go.

name: Rick
line: Tend your garden, kids, I'm kinda doing a thing here.

name: Summer
line: Grandpa Rick, we’re not leaving without you!

name: Rick
line: Oh my god [belches] you guys I get it. You're afraid the big bad hivemind is gonna steal  your grandpa away.

name: Summer
line: Actually, no. I think Unity's great and you're a horrible influence on it!

name: Rick
line: What?

name: Morty
line: This isn't healthy, Rick! Y- you know you-you're really up to no good around here. I-at-at this place,  you know?

name: Summer
line: You and Unity are like... like... leggings and mid-calf boots. You think you're great together but you're just bringing out the worst in each other!

name: Rick
line: Oh, gee, boy Summer, well put. Uh, why don't we see what Unity thinks. Unity?

name: Unity (Shades guy)
line: I'm just taking a little break from stuff. You know? I need to relax.

name: Rick
line: Oh, hey, wh-what's this on the news, guys? L-l-let me turn it up.

name: Unity (Todd)
line: In the news today, this looks a lot worse than it is. We’re... really just having a good time. Karen?

name: Unity (Karen)
line: Thanks, Todd. Up next

name: Rick
line: I think you two are a little outnumbered.

name: Summer
line: Okay! Well, what if you did it for me? What if you came with us as a favour to us... because you love us?

name: Rick
line: What? Dumb. Bye.

name: Morty
line: But Rick, Summer's just-

name: Rick
line: Summer's just a hyper-emotional, needy little- what's the word I'm looking for here... uh- human! It runs in the family! I can tolerate it but I can't give a crap about it. Take a hike.

name: Summer
line: Take care of yourself, Unity.

name: Rick
line: I'm not looking for judgement, just a yes or no. Can you assimilate a giraffe?

name: Beth
line: You're the worst!

name: Jerry
line: No! You're the worst! You don't support this family!

name: Jerry
line: All you care about is yourself!

name: Beth
line: You think supporting the family is about supporting you emotionally...

name: Jerry
line: You've got two children being dragged across the cosmos...

name: Beth
line: ...but you're unsupportable! Because it's never enough, Jerry!

name: Jerry
line: ...by your dangerously ill father, and you force me to watch it happen!

name: Beth
line: It will never be enough support to satisfy you! And you don't even know what it's like...

name: Jerry
line: Because you'd rather lose them and lose me than lose him!

name: Beth
line: ...to be afraid of losing anything because you cling and you cling and you cling...

name: Jerry
line: And why? Because you're the child, Beth. You, not me, you!

name: Jerry
line: Aaah!

name: Beth
line: Oh my god!

name: Beth and Jerry
line: Aah!

name: Blim Blam
line: Um, first of all, hello. Uh, my name is Blim Blam the korblok. Second of all, cards on the table

name: Blim Blam
line: You know what? I'm taking this.

name: Blim Blam
line: How do you- what is this?

name: Blim Blam
line: Uh, is there a slow setting? Best door ever.

name: Rick
line: Aaah! [coughs] Okay, okay, now make him cry. But happy cry. Now make ‘em all make fun of the blonde one. Now make ‘em all do it on the table! I can’t believe you created a whole show for me. Now cancel it! Okay, now put it back on. Haha! [pauses] Alright, I’m bored.

name: Unity (Administrator)
line: Rick, is there a way for you to call Summer and Morty? I feel bad that they-

name: Rick
line: Pfft, screw those guys! Uugh, I'll be right back. Don't waste your brain on those weirdos, Unity. They're no different from any other aimless chumps that you occupy. They just put you at the centre of their lives because you're powerful and then because they put you there they want you to be less powerful. Never gonna happen though, right?

name: Unity (all)
line: Never.

name: Rick
line: Never! Back in a flash.

name: Rick
line: Best weekend ever, Rick! I agree, Rick! Let's see how long we can go!

name: Rick
line: Hey Une! You got any more-

name: Unity (voiceover)
line: Rick, forgive me for doing this in notes. I'm not strong enough to do it in persons.

name: Unity (voiceover)
line: I realize now that I'm attracted to you for the same reason I can't be with you. You can't change. And I have no problem with that, but... it clearly means I have a problem with myself.

name: Unity (voiceover)
line: I'm sure there's no perfect version of me. I'm sure I'll just unify species after species and never really be complete.

name: Unity (voiceover)
line: But I know how it goes with us. I lose who I am and become part of you. Because in a strange way you're better at what I do without even trying. Yours, and nobody else's, Unity. P.S. I don't know where those coal miners were before they got assimilated. You might want to get checked.

name: Rick
line: Hey.

name: Beth
line: Dad... [clears throat] I... um... Jerry and I were looking for our weed whacker, and found your subterranean lair... and your alien prisoner. And... he got away. And I know I sound like mom but I can't sacrifice this whole family's safety just because I'm afraid you'll leave again, so no more alien prisoners, and, no more subterranean excavation without consulting us.

name: Rick
line: Okay.

name: Beth
line: ...Okay? Y-y-y-y-Okay like you're gonna quietly teleport somewhere and never come back?

name: Rick
line: No. It's your house.

name: Summer
line: Grandpa Rick! What happened... with Unity?

name: Rick
line: Who? Oh. Unity. Yeah, well, I mean honestly we’re talking about an entity that thrives on enslavement, you know. It's not cool. Fun's fun but who needs it? I'll be in the garage.

name: Rick
line: Unity! Unity! Unity!

name: Beta-7
line: How can I assist you?

name: Rick
line: I wanna talk to [belches] Unity. Beta-7, I know it's in there!

name: Beta-7
line: You're classified as a hostile entity, and Unity doesn't want to talk to you.

name: Rick
line: I know your game, Beta-7, I’ve met a billion of you, you little on-deck in-the-wind shoulder to cry on!

name: Beta-7
line: You are classified as a hostile entity.

name: Rick
line: Well, you're just loving this, mother f- this isn't gonna shape out like you think, pal! Unity's not into other hiveminds! It's gonna suck you in and use you up and a month from now I'm going to be making out with all of you in a bunch of red wigs! Unity! Unity! Unity, I know you can hear me! Get out here!

name: Beta-7
line: Weapons systems engaged.

name: Rick
line: Oh, in your dreams you have weapons systems.

name: Morty
line: Ugh, Rick, you said we were going to a movie.

name: Rick
line: We are, Morty. Alright, Beta-shit-7, you just got saved by the bell, bitch!

name: Rick
line: "They're no different from any of the aimless chumps that you occupy, they just put you at the center of their lives because you're powerful, then because they put you there they want you to be less powerful. Never gonna happen though, right?"

name: Unity
line: "Never."
